Description: This session is intended for early-stage investigators to acquire skills and develop key strategies in order to avoid “pitfalls” and develop “alternative” tactics to enhance the probability of success in their first independent leadership position.  We have recruited an expert panel of established investigators with invaluable experience on “how to” navigate a successful career in cancer research.  This session is designed specifically for those who have already made the transition from trainee to the next career stage inside and outside of academia. This is an absolute  must-attend session for all early-stage investigators.
SearchResultBody: PAS04. How to Design a Successful Career Path in Cancer Research: The Do’s and Don’ts for Early-Stage Investigators
Title: How to Design a Successful Career Path in Cancer Research: The Do’s and Don’ts for Early-Stage Investigators
